lead_paragraph: Brian Ching scored the tying goal for Houston a little more than a minute after New England’s Taylor Twellman scored what appeared to be the winner in overtime yesterday as the Dynamo won on penalty kicks, 4-3, to capture the M.L.S. Cup in Frisco, Tex. In the fifth and final round of penalty kicks, Houston goalkeeper Pat Onstad blocked Jay Heaps’s line drive to give the Dynamo a championship in its first year in Houston.
